messages.agent_message: I can also create a new account for you. Would you like to do that today?
Ok! No accounts will be created.
Would you like to send any funds to a contact today?
No problem! No e-transfers will be sent.
You have a few outstanding bills. Would you like to pay them off now?
Which bill would you like to pay off?
messages.user_message: Please pay my credit card payment.

messages.agent_message: Which account would you like to use?
Paying your credit card bill from your savings account...
Are you expecting funds from any of your contacts?
Which contact would you like to request money from and how much?
messages.user_message: Please send a request for Nancy to send me 3.

messages.agent_message: Ok, I'm requesting a transfer of 3 from Nancy. I will let you know when the transfer goes through.
Are you looking to perform any transfers today?
Let's do it! How much do you wish to transfer and between which accounts?
messages.user_message: I want to transfer 5000 from savings to retirement fund.

messages.agent_message: Transferring 5000 from savings to retirement fund...
All done. Have a nice day!
